author: jalkanen
msg: handleAccessRule() and handleVariable() now reference the realPage instead of the master page to prevent leakage.

author: jalkanen
msg: Improved to start/shutdown tomcat and clean away previous contexts.

author: jalkanen
msg: Added TryCatchFinally support and cleanup of the tag data, i.e. no more dangling WikiContexts.

author: jalkanen
msg: WikiSession now stores guest sessions as ThreadLocals and they are reused.
